name: Mermaid Shores (Demo)
description:
This is the demo of Mermaid Shores, a romance visual novel. A summer visit to your aunt’s home leads to a very memorable encounter with an unforgettable merboy. When the two of you reconnect many years later, you realize a little too late that handsome mermen aren’t the only secrets that lie within the ocean’s depths…

Demo Features:

  • Customizable genders for the protagonist.
  • Original BGs and CGs
